'''Summerchill Dreams''' is [[Qiqi]]'s Default [[Character Outfit]].

==Appearance==
<!-- Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 1-2 paragraphs (preferably 1 paragraph) with 3-4 sentences each. -->
The long part of Qiqi's hair is braided into a long plait.

Qiqi has several ''fulu'' talismans stuck on her. Her attire consists of a purple frock and a deep purple beret with a magenta tassel on top and her {{Cryo}} [[Vision]] embedded in the side. She wears a pair of simple earrings, one black and one white. She also wears black heels and white stockings wrapped in mummy-like bandages. Her fingernails are black.
